cvm

类 DistributedCVM

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.AbstractCVM
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.AbstractDistributedCVM
        • cvm.DistributedCVM
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.ComponentVirtualMachineI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.DistributedComponentVirtualMachineI

    public class DistributedCVM
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.AbstractDistributedCVM
    The class DistributedCVM implements the distributed CVM for the sensor network simulation. There are five JVMs in this distributed CVM chaque cvm possede un client et 10 nodes d'ailleur, le premier JVM possede le registre global et l'horloge
